templates.name: DMVPN for Cloud Router - System Default
templates.description: DMVPN for Cloud Router - System Default
templates.author: SYSTEM
templates.templateContent:
!--- BGP Config ---
router bgp $AutonomousSystemNumberOfCloudRouter
address-family ipv4 vrf dmvpn
  neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP remote-as $AutonomousSystemNumberOfBranchRouter
  neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP fall-over bfd
  neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP activate
exit-address-family

templates.name: IPsec for Branch Router - System Default
templates.description: IPsec for Branch Router - System Default
templates.author: SYSTEM
templates.templateContent:
!--- Crypto Config ---
crypto isakmp policy 200
encr aes
authentication pre-share
group 2
lifetime 28800
crypto isakmp key cisco address 0.0.0.0
crypto isakmp keepalive 10 10
!
crypto ipsec security-association replay window-size 1024
!
crypto ipsec transform-set csr esp-aes esp-sha-hmac
mode tunnel
crypto ipsec df-bit clear
!
!
crypto ipsec profile csr-prof
set transform-set csr
!
!--- IPsec Tunnel Config ---
interface Tunnel11
shutdown
ip address $TunnelRouterIP1 $TunnelSubnetMask1
tunnel source $TunnelSource1
tunnel destination $TunnelDestinationIP1
tunnel protection ipsec profile csr-prof
tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
ip mtu $mtu
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
no shutdown
!
interface Tunnel12
shutdown
ip address $TunnelRouterIP2 $TunnelSubnetMask2
tunnel source $TunnelSource2
tunnel destination $TunnelDestinationIP2
tunnel protection ipsec profile csr-prof
tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
ip mtu $mtu
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
no shutdown
!
interface Loopback0
ip address $OspfRouterId 255.255.255.255
!
!--- BGP Config ---
router bgp $AutonomousSystemNumber
 bgp log-neighbor-changes
 neighbor $CSRTunnelIP1 remote-as $NeighborBgpASNOfCloudRouter1
 neighbor $CSRTunnelIP1 timers 10 30 30
 neighbor $CSRTunnelIP2 remote-as $NeighborBgpASNOfCloudRouter2
 neighbor $CSRTunnelIP2 timers 10 30 30
 !
address-family ipv4
  network $OspfRouterId mask 255.255.255.255
  neighbor $CSRTunnelIP1 activate
  neighbor $CSRTunnelIP1 as-override
  neighbor $CSRTunnelIP1 soft-reconfiguration inbound
  neighbor $CSRTunnelIP2 activate
  neighbor $CSRTunnelIP2 as-override
  neighbor $CSRTunnelIP2 soft-reconfiguration inbound
 exit-address-family
!

templates.name: DMVPN Spoke for Branch Router - System Default
templates.description: Dynamic Multipoint VPN Spoke for Branch Router
templates.author: SYSTEM
templates.templateContent:
!--- Crypto Config ---
crypto keyring keyring-dmvpn
  local-address $TunnelSource
  pre-shared-key address 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 key cisco
!
crypto isakmp policy 200
encr aes
authentication pre-share
group 2
lifetime 28800
crypto isakmp keepalive 10 10
crypto isakmp profile dmvpn
   keyring keyring-dmvpn
   match identity address 0.0.0.0
   local-address $TunnelSource
!
crypto ipsec security-association replay window-size 1024
!
crypto ipsec transform-set dmvpn esp-aes esp-sha-hmac
mode transport
!
!
crypto ipsec profile dmvpn-prof
set transform-set dmvpn
!
!--- DMVPN Tunnel Config ---
interface Loopback0
ip address $OspfRouterId 255.255.255.255
!
interface Tunnel0
ip address $TunnelIPAddress $TunnelSubnetMask
no ip redirects
ip mtu $mtu
!
ip nhrp map multicast $PublicIPCloudRouter1 !PUBLICIP OF CSR1
ip nhrp map $ActiveCloudRouterTunnelIP $PublicIPCloudRouter1
ip nhrp map multicast $PublicIPCloudRouter2 !PUBLICIP OF CSR2
ip nhrp map $StandbyCloudRouterTunnelIP $PublicIPCloudRouter2
ip nhrp network-id $NetworkId
ip nhrp nhs $ActiveCloudRouterTunnelIP
ip nhrp nhs $StandbyCloudRouterTunnelIP
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
bfd interval 100 min_rx 100 multiplier 3
tunnel source $TunnelSource
tunnel mode gre multipoint
tunnel key $TunnelKey
tunnel protection ipsec profile dmvpn-prof
!
!--- BGP Config ---
router bgp $AutonomousSystemNumber
bgp log-neighbor-changes
neighbor $ActiveCloudRouterTunnelIP remote-as $NeighborBgpASNOfActiveCloudRouter
neighbor $ActiveCloudRouterTunnelIP fall-over bfd
neighbor $StandbyCloudRouterTunnelIP remote-as $NeighborBgpASNOfStandbyCloudRouter
neighbor $StandbyCloudRouterTunnelIP fall-over bfd
!
address-family ipv4
  network $OspfRouterId mask 255.255.255.255
  neighbor $ActiveCloudRouterTunnelIP activate
  neighbor $StandbyCloudRouterTunnelIP activate
exit-address-family
!

templateParams.description: OSPF Router ID in IP Address format (Unique Id per device)
templateParams.displayName: OSPF Router ID in IP Address format (Unique Id per device)

templates.name: For-Loop-Velocity
templates.author: SYSTEM
templates.templateContent:
Numbers from 0 to 10 (in one line):
#foreach($number in [0..10]) $number, #end


#set($deviceTypes = ['Routers', 'Switches and Hubs', 'Voice and Telephony', 'Wireless Controller', 'Wireless Sensor'])
Device types (in multiple lines):
#foreach($deviceType in $deviceTypes)
  deviceType : $deviceType
#end


#set($var = '192.168.0.1')
#set($list = [10, "Router", false, $var])
List of variables of different types:
#foreach($elem in $list)
  Element : $elem
#end

templates.author: admin

templateErrors.message: This command is reserved to be used by Cisco Catalyst Center

templates.name: 6. FABRIC-OVERLAY
templates.author: admin

templates.name: 1. FABRIC-VRF
templates.author: admin

templates.name: DEFN-LOOPBACKS
templates.author: admin

templates.name: 7. FABRIC-NAC-IOT
templates.author: admin
templates.templateContent:
{% include "EVPN/DEFN-VRF" %}
{% include "EVPN/DEFN-NAC-IOT" %}

{% for input_vrf in vrf_list %}
    {% for vrf in DEFN_VRF %}
    {% for nac in DEFN_NAC_IOT %}
        {% if vrf.name == input_vrf and vrf.name == nac.vrf %}
        {% set nac_servername = 'NAC_' + vrf.id + '_' + nac.nac_ip %}
        !
        #INTERACTIVE
        class-map type control subscriber match-all AAA_SVR_DOWN_AUTHD_HOST<IQ>Do you wish to continue?<R>yes
        #END_INTERACTIVE
         match result-type aaa-timeout
         match authorization-status authorized
        !
        class-map type control subscriber match-all AAA_SVR_DOWN_UNAUTHD_HOST
         match result-type aaa-timeout
         match authorization-status unauthorized
        !
        class-map type control subscriber match-all AUTHC_SUCCESS-AUTHZ_FAIL
         match authorization-status unauthorized
         match result-type success
        !
        class-map type control subscriber match-all DOT1X_FAILED
         match method dot1x
         match result-type method dot1x authoritative
        !
        class-map type control subscriber match-all DOT1X_NO_RESP
         match method dot1x
         match result-type method dot1x agent-not-found
        !
        class-map type control subscriber match-all DOT1X_TIMEOUT
         match method dot1x
         match result-type method dot1x method-timeout
        !
        class-map type control subscriber match-all IN_CRITICAL_AUTH_CLOSED_MODE
         match activated-service-template DefaultCriticalAuthVlan_SRV_TEMPLATE
         match activated-service-template DefaultCriticalVoice_SRV_TEMPLATE
        !
        class-map type control subscriber match-all MAB_FAILED
         match method mab
         match result-type method mab authoritative
        !
        class-map type control subscriber match-none NOT_IN_CRITICAL_AUTH_CLOSED_MODE
         match activated-service-template DefaultCriticalAuthVlan_SRV_TEMPLATE
         match activated-service-template DefaultCriticalVoice_SRV_TEMPLATE
        !
        radius server {{nac_servername}}
         address ipv4 {{nac.nac_ip}} auth-port 1812 acct-port 1813
         key {{nac.nac_key}}
        !
        aaa group server radius NAC_IOT_{{vrf.id}}
        server name {{nac_servername}}
        ip vrf forwarding {{vrf.name}}
        ip radius source-interface Loopback{{vrf.id}}
        retransmit 2
        timeout 10
        !
        aaa authentication dot1x NAC_IOT_AUTH_{{vrf.id}} group NAC_IOT_{{vrf.id}}
        aaa authorization network NAC_IOT_AUTHZ_{{vrf.id}} group NAC_IOT_{{vrf.id}}
        !
        policy-map type control subscriber NAC_IOT_PM_{{vrf.id}}
         event session-started match-all
          10 class always do-until-failure
           10 authenticate using mab aaa authc-list NAC_IOT_AUTH_{{vrf.id}} authz-list NAC_IOT_AUTHZ_{{vrf.id}} priority 10
         event authentication-failure match-first
          5 class DOT1X_FAILED do-until-failure
           10 terminate dot1x
           20 authenticate using mab priority 20
          10 class AAA_SVR_DOWN_UNAUTHD_HOST do-until-failure
           10 activate service-template DefaultCriticalAuthVlan_SRV_TEMPLATE
           20 activate service-template DefaultCriticalVoice_SRV_TEMPLATE
           30 authorize
           40 pause reauthentication
          20 class AAA_SVR_DOWN_AUTHD_HOST do-until-failure
           10 pause reauthentication
           20 authorize
          30 class DOT1X_NO_RESP do-until-failure
           10 terminate dot1x
           20 authenticate using mab priority 20
          40 class MAB_FAILED do-until-failure
           10 terminate mab
           20 authentication-restart 60
          50 class DOT1X_TIMEOUT do-until-failure
           10 terminate dot1x
           20 authenticate using mab priority 20
          60 class always do-until-failure
           10 terminate dot1x
           20 terminate mab
           30 authentication-restart 60
         event aaa-available match-all
          10 class IN_CRITICAL_AUTH_CLOSED_MODE do-until-failure
           10 clear-session
          20 class NOT_IN_CRITICAL_AUTH_CLOSED_MODE do-until-failure
           10 resume reauthentication
         event agent-found match-all
          10 class always do-until-failure
           10 terminate mab
           20 authenticate using dot1x retries 2 retry-time 0 priority 10
         event inactivity-timeout match-all
          10 class always do-until-failure
           10 clear-session
         event authentication-success match-all
         event violation match-all
          10 class always do-until-failure
           10 restrict
         event authorization-failure match-all
          10 class AUTHC_SUCCESS-AUTHZ_FAIL do-until-failure
           10 authentication-restart 60
        !
        template NAC_TEMPLATE_IOT_{{vrf.id}}
        dot1x pae authenticator
        dot1x timeout tx-period 7
        dot1x timeout supp-timeout 7
        dot1x max-req 3
        dot1x max-reauth-req 3
        mab
        access-session closed
        access-session port-control auto
        authentication periodic
        authentication timer reauthenticate server
        service-policy type control subscriber NAC_IOT_PM_{{vrf.id}}
        load-interval 30
        {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
    {% endfor %}
{% endfor %}
templates.promotedTemplateContent:
{% include "EVPN/DEFN-VRF" %}
{% include "EVPN/DEFN-NAC-IOT" %}

{% for input_vrf in vrf_list %}
    {% for vrf in DEFN_VRF %}
    {% for nac in DEFN_NAC_IOT %}

        #END_INTERACTIVE

         match authorization-status authorized

         match result-type aaa-timeout

         match activated-service-template DefaultCriticalAuthVlan_SRV_TEMPLATE
         match activated-service-template DefaultCriticalVoice_SRV_TEMPLATE

        !

        !

        server name {{nac_servername}}
        ip vrf forwarding {{vrf.name}}
        ip radius source-interface Loopback{{vrf.id}}
        retransmit 2
        timeout 10
        !
        aaa authentication dot1x NAC_IOT_AUTH_{{vrf.id}} group NAC_IOT_{{vrf.id}}
        aaa authorization network NAC_IOT_AUTHZ_{{vrf.id}} group NAC_IOT_{{vrf.id}}
        !
        policy-map type control subscriber NAC_IOT_PM_{{vrf.id}}
         event session-started match-all
          10 class always do-until-failure
           10 authenticate using mab aaa authc-list NAC_IOT_AUTH_{{vrf.id}} authz-list NAC_IOT_AUTHZ_{{vrf.id}} priority 10
         event authentication-failure match-first
          5 class DOT1X_FAILED do-until-failure
           10 terminate dot1x
           20 authenticate using mab priority 20
          10 class AAA_SVR_DOWN_UNAUTHD_HOST do-until-failure
           10 activate service-template DefaultCriticalAuthVlan_SRV_TEMPLATE
           20 activate service-template DefaultCriticalVoice_SRV_TEMPLATE
           30 authorize
           40 pause reauthentication
          20 class AAA_SVR_DOWN_AUTHD_HOST do-until-failure
           10 pause reauthentication
           20 authorize
          30 class DOT1X_NO_RESP do-until-failure
           10 terminate dot1x
           20 authenticate using mab priority 20
          40 class MAB_FAILED do-until-failure
           10 terminate mab
           20 authentication-restart 60
          50 class DOT1X_TIMEOUT do-until-failure
           10 terminate dot1x
           20 authenticate using mab priority 20
          60 class always do-until-failure
           10 terminate dot1x
           20 terminate mab
           30 authentication-restart 60
         event aaa-available match-all
          10 class IN_CRITICAL_AUTH_CLOSED_MODE do-until-failure
           10 clear-session
          20 class NOT_IN_CRITICAL_AUTH_CLOSED_MODE do-until-failure
           10 resume reauthentication
         event agent-found match-all
          10 class always do-until-failure
           10 terminate mab
           20 authenticate using dot1x retries 2 retry-time 0 priority 10
         event inactivity-timeout match-all
          10 class always do-until-failure
           10 clear-session
         event authentication-success match-all
         event violation match-all
          10 class always do-until-failure
           10 restrict
         event authorization-failure match-all
          10 class AUTHC_SUCCESS-AUTHZ_FAIL do-until-failure
           10 authentication-restart 60
        !
        template NAC_TEMPLATE_IOT_{{vrf.id}}
        dot1x pae authenticator
        dot1x timeout tx-period 7
        dot1x timeout supp-timeout 7
        dot1x max-req 3
        dot1x max-reauth-req 3
        mab
        access-session closed
        access-session port-control auto
        authentication periodic
        authentication timer reauthenticate server
        service-policy type control subscriber NAC_IOT_PM_{{vrf.id}}
        load-interval 30
        {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
    {% endfor %}
{% endfor %}

templates.name: Base Config
templates.author: SYSTEM
templates.templateContent:
!
!
no service pad
service timestamps debug datetime msec localtime
service timestamps log datetime msec localtime
service password-encryption
!
hostname {{ HOSTNAME }}

!
boot-start-marker
boot-end-marker
!
enable secret xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx
!
!
!
! need to define aaa server to use aaa
!aaa new-model
!
!
!aaa authentication login default group tacacs+ enable none
!aaa authentication login console enable none
!aaa authentication enable default group tacacs+ enable none
!aaa authorization exec default group tacacs+ none
!aaa authorization exec console none
! this causes pnp issues
!aaa authorization commands 15 default group tacacs+ none
!
!
!
aaa session-id common
clock timezone EST 10
clock summer-time EDT recurring 1 Sun Oct 2:00 1 Sun Apr 2:00
!
vtp mode off
!
no ip source-route
!
!
!
!
vlan internal allocation policy ascending
!
vlan {{ USERVLAN }}
 name uservlan
!
!
ip ssh version 2
!
!
{% block interfaces %}
{% endblock %}
interface Vlan1
 no ip address
 no ip route-cache
 shutdown
!
interface Vlan{{ management }}
 ip address {{ ManagementIP }} 255.255.255.0
 no ip route-cache
!
no ip http server
no ip http secure-server

line con 0
 stopbits 1
line aux 0
 stopbits 1
line vty 0 4
 access-class 4 in
 exec-timeout 20 0
password 7 xxxxxxxxxxxxxx
 transport input ssh
 transport output ssh
line vty 5 15
 access-class 4 in
 exec-timeout 5 0
password 7 0xxxxxxxxxxxxxx
 transport input ssh
 transport output ssh
!
end

templates.name: DMVPN Hub for Cloud Router- System Default
templates.description: Dynamic Multipoint VPN Hub for Cloud Router
templates.author: SYSTEM
templates.templateContent:
!
ip vrf dmvpn
rd $VrfDmvpnRouteDistinguisher
route-target export $VrfDmvpnRouteTarget
route-target import $VrfDmvpnRouteTarget
!
!--- Crypto Config ---
crypto keyring keyring-dmvpn
  local-address GigabitEthernet1
  pre-shared-key address 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 key cisco
!
crypto isakmp policy 200
encr aes
authentication pre-share
group 2
lifetime 28800
crypto isakmp keepalive 10 10
crypto isakmp profile dmvpn
   keyring keyring-dmvpn
   match identity address 0.0.0.0
   local-address GigabitEthernet1
!
crypto ipsec security-association replay window-size 1024
!
crypto ipsec transform-set dmvpn esp-aes esp-sha-hmac
mode transport
!
crypto ipsec profile dmvpn-prof
set transform-set dmvpn
!
!--- DMVPN Tunnel Config ---
interface Loopback77
ip vrf forwarding dmvpn
ip address $OspfRouterId 255.255.255.255
!
!-- Tunnel11 is used for ip route with DNACenter as below ---
!ip route DNACIpAddress 255.255.255.255 Tunnel11
!
interface Tunnel11
ip vrf forwarding dmvpn
ip address $TunnelIpAddress $TunnelSubnetMask
no ip redirects
ip mtu $mtu
#if ( $isStandby == "0" )
  ip nhrp map multicast $ActiveCloudRouterPublicIP
  ip nhrp map $ActiveCloudRouterTunnelIP $ActiveCloudRouterPublicIP
#end
ip nhrp network-id $NetworkId
#if ( $isStandby == "0" )
  ip nhrp nhs $ActiveCloudRouterTunnelIP
#end
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
bfd interval 100 min_rx 100 multiplier 3
tunnel source GigabitEthernet1
tunnel mode gre multipoint
tunnel key $TunnelKey
tunnel protection ipsec profile dmvpn-prof
!
!--- BGP Config ---
router bgp $AutonomousSystemNumber
bgp log-neighbor-changes
!
address-family ipv4 vrf dmvpn
  network $OspfRouterId mask 255.255.255.255
  #if(${CloudRouterSubnet1})
  network $CloudRouterSubnet1 mask $CloudRouterSubnetMask1
  #end
  #if(${CloudRouterSubnet2})
  network $CloudRouterSubnet2 mask $CloudRouterSubnetMask2
  #end
  neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP remote-as $NeighborBgpASN
  neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP fall-over bfd
  neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP activate
exit-address-family

templates.name: IPsec 1 Branch for Cloud Router - System Default
templates.description: IPsec 1 Branch for Cloud Router - System Default
templates.author: SYSTEM
templates.templateContent:
!--- Crypto Config ---
crypto isakmp policy 200
encr aes
authentication pre-share
group 2
lifetime 28800
crypto isakmp key cisco address 0.0.0.0
crypto isakmp keepalive 10 10
!
crypto ipsec security-association replay window-size 1024
!
crypto ipsec transform-set csr esp-aes esp-sha-hmac
mode tunnel
crypto ipsec df-bit clear
!
crypto ipsec profile csr-prof
set transform-set csr
!--- IPsec Tunnel Config ---
interface Tunnel11
ip address $CloudRouterTunnelIpAddress $CloudRouterTunnelSubnetMask
tunnel source GigabitEthernet1
tunnel destination $BranchRouterPublicIpAddress
tunnel protection ipsec profile csr-prof
tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
ip mtu $mtu
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
!
interface Loopback100
no ip address
!
interface Loopback111
ip address $OspfRouterId 255.255.255.255
!--- BGP Config ---
router bgp $AutonomousSystemNumber
bgp log-neighbor-changes
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP remote-as $NeighborBgpASN
!
address-family ipv4
network $OspfRouterId mask 255.255.255.255
  #if(${CloudRouterSubnet1})
  network $CloudRouterSubnet1 mask $CloudRouterSubnetMask1
  #end
  #if(${CloudRouterSubnet2})
  network $CloudRouterSubnet2 mask $CloudRouterSubnetMask2
  #end
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP activate
!

templates.description: IPsec 2 Branch for Cloud Router - System Default
templates.author: SYSTEM
templates.templateContent:
!--- Crypto Config ---
crypto isakmp policy 200
encr aes
authentication pre-share
group 2
lifetime 28800
crypto isakmp key cisco address 0.0.0.0
crypto isakmp keepalive 10 10
!
crypto ipsec security-association replay window-size 1024
!
crypto ipsec transform-set csr esp-aes esp-sha-hmac
mode tunnel
crypto ipsec df-bit clear
!
crypto ipsec profile csr-prof
set transform-set csr
!--- IPsec Tunnel Config ---
interface Tunnel11
ip address $CloudRouterTunnelIpAddress1 $CloudRouterTunnelSubnetMask1
tunnel source GigabitEthernet1
tunnel destination $BranchRouterPublicIpAddress1
tunnel protection ipsec profile csr-prof
tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
ip mtu $mtu
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
!--- IPsec Tunnel Config ---
interface Tunnel12
ip address $CloudRouterTunnelIpAddress2 $CloudRouterTunnelSubnetMask2
tunnel source GigabitEthernet1
tunnel destination $BranchRouterPublicIpAddress2
tunnel protection ipsec profile csr-prof
tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
ip mtu $mtu
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
!
interface Loopback100
no ip address
!         
interface Loopback111
ip address $OspfRouterId 255.255.255.255
!--- BGP Config ---
router bgp $AutonomousSystemNumber
bgp log-neighbor-changes
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP1 remote-as $NeighborBgpBranchRouter-1-ASN
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP2 remote-as $NeighborBgpBranchRouter-2-ASN
!        
address-family ipv4
network $OspfRouterId mask 255.255.255.255
  #if(${CloudRouterSubnet1})
  network $CloudRouterSubnet1 mask $CloudRouterSubnetMask1
  #end
  #if(${CloudRouterSubnet2})
  network $CloudRouterSubnet2 mask $CloudRouterSubnetMask2
  #end
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP1 activate
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP2 activate

templates.promotedTemplateContent:
!--- Crypto Config ---
crypto isakmp policy 200
encr aes
authentication pre-share
group 2
lifetime 28800
crypto isakmp key cisco address 0.0.0.0
crypto isakmp keepalive 10 10
!
crypto ipsec security-association replay window-size 1024
!
crypto ipsec transform-set csr esp-aes esp-sha-hmac
mode tunnel
crypto ipsec df-bit clear
!
crypto ipsec profile csr-prof
set transform-set csr
!--- IPsec Tunnel Config ---
interface Tunnel11
ip address $CloudRouterTunnelIpAddress1 $CloudRouterTunnelSubnetMask1
tunnel source GigabitEthernet1
tunnel destination $BranchRouterPublicIpAddress1
tunnel protection ipsec profile csr-prof
tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
ip mtu $mtu
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
!--- IPsec Tunnel Config ---
interface Tunnel12
ip address $CloudRouterTunnelIpAddress2 $CloudRouterTunnelSubnetMask2
tunnel source GigabitEthernet1
tunnel destination $BranchRouterPublicIpAddress2
tunnel protection ipsec profile csr-prof
tunnel mode ipsec ipv4
ip mtu $mtu
ip tcp adjust-mss 1360
!
interface Loopback100
no ip address
!         
interface Loopback111
ip address $OspfRouterId 255.255.255.255
!--- BGP Config ---
router bgp $AutonomousSystemNumber
bgp log-neighbor-changes
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP1 remote-as $NeighborBgpBranchRouter-1-ASN
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP2 remote-as $NeighborBgpBranchRouter-2-ASN
!        
address-family ipv4
network $OspfRouterId mask 255.255.255.255
  #if(${CloudRouterSubnet1})
  network $CloudRouterSubnet1 mask $CloudRouterSubnetMask1
  #end
  #if(${CloudRouterSubnet2})
  network $CloudRouterSubnet2 mask $CloudRouterSubnetMask2
  #end
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP1 activate
neighbor $BranchRouterTunnelIP2 activate
